name: bunch
content:
bunch noun
(GROUP)
Add to word list
Add to word list
B1 [ C ] a number of things of the same type fastened together or in a close group: a bunch of flowers/grapes/bananas/keysmainly US informal The reorganization will give us a whole bunch (= a lot) of problems.
B1 [ S ] a group of people: They're a bunch of jerks. Your friends are a nice bunch. the best/pick of the bunch
the best person or thing, or the best people or things, from a group of similar people or things: Send in your poems and we'll publish the best of the bunch.
